summary: Completed comprehensive testing of TradingView removal and custom recharts implementation across SwingAI application. Successfully verified that all TradingView iframes have been completely removed and replaced with custom recharts AreaChart components on stock detail page, screener chart modal, and watchlist chart modal.
passed_tests: Stock detail page (/stock/[symbol]) shows custom recharts AreaChart instead of TradingView iframe
Stock chart timeframe buttons (1W, 1M, 3M, 1Y) change displayed data correctly
Stock chart Y-axis shows proper INR format (₹) labels
Stock chart tooltip displays complete OHLCV data on hover
Screener page chart modal uses custom recharts chart instead of TradingView iframe
Watchlist page chart modal uses custom recharts chart instead of TradingView iframe
No TradingView iframes found on any page across the entire application
Chart refresh button works correctly to reload data
Custom charts display historical price data with proper trend indicators
Chart colors change based on trend direction (green for bullish, red for bearish)
All chart modals open and close properly
Timeframe switching works in all chart modals

TradingView iframe removal.comprehensive_search: PASS - No TradingView components found across all pages

custom_recharts_implementation.chart_rendering: PASS - Charts render with historical price data
custom_recharts_implementation.trend_indicators: PASS - Chart colors change based on trend direction

timeframe_functionality.1W_button: PASS - Works on all chart implementations
timeframe_functionality.1M_button: PASS - Works on all chart implementations
timeframe_functionality.3M_button: PASS - Works on all chart implementations
timeframe_functionality.1Y_button: PASS - Works on all chart implementations
timeframe_functionality.data_switching: PASS - Chart data updates when timeframe changes

chart_features.OHLCV_tooltip: PASS - Tooltip shows Open, High, Low, Close, Volume data
chart_features.chart_refresh: PASS - Refresh button reloads chart data

verification_summary.tradingview_removal: 100% Complete - No TradingView iframes found anywhere
verification_summary.user_experience: Excellent - Smooth chart interactions and data display
